Container.Name: Tado Assistant
Container.Overview: Tado Assistant: Your User-Friendly, Free Tado Auto-Assist Alternative
Container.Requires: Multiple accounts can be added. See documentation for more details: https://github.com/BrainicHQ/tado-assistant?tab=readme-ov-file#-docker-installation

Config.Name: Number of Accounts
Config.Description: Number of Tado accounts you wish to manage. This should be set to the total number of accounts.

Config.Name: Account 1 - Username
Config.Description: Your Tado account username for the nth account.

Config.Name: Account 1 - Password
Config.Description: Your Tado account password for the nth account.

Config.Name: Account 1 - Checking Interval
Config.Description: Frequency (in seconds) for home state checks for the nth account. Default is every 15 seconds.

Config.Name: Account 1 - Logging
Config.Description: Toggle logging for the nth account. Values: true or false. Default is false.

Config.Name: Account 1 - Max Open Window Duration
Config.Description: Define the maximum duration (in seconds) for the 'Open Window' detection feature to be active for the nth account. Leave this field empty to use the default duration set in the Tado app.
